task.Question: In Nature journal's Scientific Reports conference proceedings from 2012, in the article that did not mention plasmons or plasmonics, what nano-compound is studied? Don't use the prefix nano in your answer if there is one.

Annotator Metadata.Steps:
1. Searched "nature scientific reports" on Google.
2. Opened https://www.nature.com/srep/.
3. Selected Explore Content > Research Articles.
4. Filtered for Conference Proceedings from 2012.
5. Opened each article link.
6. Checked for "plasmon" or "plasmonic".
7. Noted the nano-compound in the article that did not include either.

steps.content: In Nature journal's Scientific Reports conference proceedings from 2012, in the article that did not mention plasmons or plasmonics, what nano-compound is studied? Don't use the prefix nano in your answer if there is one.

plan: Search for the 2012 conference proceedings of Nature journal's Scientific Reports.
Identify articles within the proceedings that do not mention plasmons or plasmonics.
Extract the titles and abstracts of these articles to find the one that studies a nano-compound.
Determine the specific nano-compound studied in that article, ensuring to omit the prefix 'nano' in the final answer.

given_facts: The article is from Nature journal's Scientific Reports conference proceedings from 2012.
The article does not mention plasmons or plasmonics.
facts_to_lookup: The specific articles published in the 2012 conference proceedings of Nature journal's Scientific Reports.
The titles and abstracts of articles that do not mention plasmons or plasmonics.
facts_to_derive: The specific nano-compound studied in the identified article, excluding the prefix 'nano'.

steps.query: 2012 Nature Scientific Reports conference proceedings articles
2012 Nature Scientific Reports conference proceedings articles

serp.title: Conference Proceedings in 2012 | Scientific Reports
serp.content: Conference Proceeding (4) Year 2012 (4) Layered plasmonic cloaks to tailor the optical scattering at the nanoscale

serp.title: Articles in 2012 | Scientific Reports
serp.content: Articles in 2012. Filter By: Article Type. All. All; Addendum (2) · Article (793) · Conference Proceeding (4) · Erratum (6) · Retraction (2). Year. 2012 (807).

serp.title: Articles in 2012 | Scientific Reports
serp.content: Articles in 2012. Filter By: Article Type. All. All; Addendum (2) · Article (793) · Conference Proceeding (4) · Erratum (6) · Retraction (2). Year. 2012 (807).

serp.title: Volume 2012 | Scientific Reports
serp.content: Browse all the issues in Volume 2012 of Scientific Reports.

serp.title: Conference Proceedings | Scientific Reports
serp.content: Browse the archive of articles on Scientific Reports. ... 2012 (4) · Influence of electric current pulses on the solidification of Cu ...

steps.fact_description: nano-compound studied in the article that does not mention plasmons or plasmonics
